About Us:
AndroidDevNation is a social app for developers who wants to be able to share there own ideas and latest creations on the go.
Version: 1.0 Alpha
Developers Of DevNation: -Julian Seaborn (Developer) - Jetx2x (Developer)
Thanks to our Beta testers and Alpha Testers for all the testing done to the app.
Website: http://vengemobile.forumotion.com/ Email: Vengemobilecontact@gmail.com Hangout Room ( Talk to devs): https://web.groupme.com/groups/3471447
